markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inner Strength](/Feats.aspx?ID=1609) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your strength is part of your rage, so as long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement. You reduce your [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) condition's value by 1.
name: Inner Strength
